title: Nowt so daft...
description: Nowt so daft... a book of 160 single panel cartoons by Glasgow cartoonist Kieran Meehan is now available on Kindle AND to borrow KDP Select. We think you'll love his cast of regular characters and scenarios - from cavemen to vikings, from pirates to cowboys and my own favourites, the executioners and the devils - you have to see them! Check out the website www.nowtsodaft.com Amazon http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_ss_... The printed version is in pocket book format so it makes a perfect Christmas stocking filler, so what's stopping you? You won't regret it
author: Kieran Meehan
